episodes.title: Niall Boylan spoke to Daniella Young about escaping a cult
episodes.description: Niall Boylan spoke to Daniella Young. Daniella's life is unlike many others - she was born into a religious cult called The Children of God and at the age of 15 she escaped. Here she tells Niall all about her life which trust us - is phenomenal! Why not thank me for another great show by sharing the price of a pint beer or cup of coffee in some trendy cafe. Also you will be helping ius to make the shows better everyday. So subscribe by clicking here https://plus.acast.com/s/the-niall-boylan-podcast.   Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
